title: Attend SNA 2015 Conference in Atlanta and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Attend SNA 2015 Conference in Atlanta and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport hotel North I-85 offers affordable lodging to guests attending SNA 2015 in Atlanta on July 21-23, 2015. We are pleased to offer convenient and affordable accommodations to guests attending the SNA 2015 Conference. ATLANTA, GA, July 18,   The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport hotel North I-85 offers affordable lodging to participants attending SNA 2015 in Atlanta. Southern Nursery Association (SNA) 2015 will be held July 21-23 at the Georgia International Convention Center. The event includes the Southern Plant Conference, the SNA Research Conference, and the SNA Annual Business Meeting. Thousands of industry professionals from across the region are expected to attend. "We are pleased to offer convenient and affordable accommodations to guests attending the SNA 2015 Conference," shares Loree Rose, Director of Sales at the Hampton Inn & Suites. "Our airport hotel is located just 2.5 miles from the Georgia International Convention Center," explains Ms. Rose. This award winning Hartsfield hotel features non-smoking guest rooms with free high speed Internet and Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . Guests will enjoy the added convenience of a microwave and mini refrigerator in the suites. The complimentary Hampton On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is the perfect way to start the day. Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags are a convenient option on weekday mornings. Guests can cool off in the hotel's outdoor pool, or enjoy a workout in the fitness center. Other property amenities include a business center and Pavilion Pantry Market. Travelers can check flight schedules on the Flight Board in the lobby, and then board the complimentary shuttle to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport. This Hampton Inn & Suites received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Current lodging specials at the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 include the HHonors Weekend and the Park, Stay, & Go package. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. HHonors members can earn Double Points or Double Miles through August 31. For information about SNA 2015 in Atlanta on July 21-23, visit http://sna.org/ . To book your stay at Hampton Inn & Suites North I-85 ATL Airport hotel , call 404-767-9300 or visit www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.com .About Hampton Inn & Ste Atlanta Airport North I-85 The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport Hotel is just north of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and just southwest of downtown Atlanta. The hotel is two and a half miles from the Georgia International Convention Center, four miles from Atlanta Expo Center, and 15 miles from Six Flags Over Georgia. Other nearby attractions include the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola , Underground Atlanta, CNN Center, Georgia Dome and Georgia World Congress Center--all less than 10 miles away from the hotel. The Atlanta Airport hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guest's stay exceptional. For more information visit: http://www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.COM For all media inquiries, please contact: Allison Reinert
